body: The rape part, and the part where she fucked nakamura without even asking if her BF was okay with it and didn't even let him watch ruined it.. Espescially the lack of consecuense for the rape... instant boner kill
NTR out of nowhere. Well, more like attempted NTR? Blackmail and rape without question though. They both should have jumped yamaguchi

This one just feels bad. Specially cause the first one was really cute. 

And here Natsuzuka was blackmailed and raped, the rapist didnt get any punishment.

And Morimoto looked really unconfortable while Natsuzuka was cheating with Nakamura, cause Natsuzuka only asked if he was ok with it after the fact.

And now we discover it was incest the whole time.

Terrible sequel.

"That reminds me, do you think you could turn me back into a guy already?"

"I don't wanna."

BASED
I'll be honest I like ntr, sometimes f*cked up ntr. But this ntr???. IS F*CKING BULLSH*T!!!!!. WHY PUT NTR HERE!?!? BRUUUH...
Why put fuking NTR shit in the midle? It ruined it, fuck. 10/10 to 0/10

Ok the plot was pretty amazing, but the fact that the rapist got out too easily left a bad taste in my mouth. Apart from that, pretty great gender bender doujin, the art was pretty good too, and I didn't mind the scene with Nakamura, I think it was pretty sweet actually. The two MCs seem to be confident enough in their love towards each other to be able to have polyamorous sex with other partners without threatening their relationship :) 
I feel like there's something missing at the end though, we don't really get closure about wtf is going on. It's still a nice wish fulfilment story for people with conflicting gender feels, I'm just upset about the way the blackmail and rape got handled
the first part was based but this was just awkward
@AITaco808 bruh lmao are you stupid? I was talking about the end, yk when mc was chill about it and even gave them privacy, unlike the whole blackmail thing which IS shit. Retard
Extremely high quality???
Was pretty decent glad he can be a girl wen he wants be pissed if he couldnt

This is so so stupid. Was good then what??????? Blackmail -> rape --> cheating ---> cheating again ----> finding out mc was born a girl -----> now the WHOLE thing was incest the WHOLE time?????????????????????????????????

@futa slayer You actual dumb ass hypocrite. You literally just said 'screw that ntr' and then went on getting mad that she didn't cheat with the short haired girl? Get the hell out of here you sub-human ntr lover.
Damn it was actually decent and then got good when mc turned into a girl, but fuck off with that ntr shit, ruined it, also pissed we didn't get to see nakamura and nastsuzaka 2/10

It's already bad enough that Yamaguchi raped Natsuzuka (for the story I guess), but why in the fucking world did it had to be so damn long, had to have anal (which was a first for her) and had him cumming inside?! That's 100% unnecessary and it only killed my boner.

Ngl I feel a bit bad for MC Morimoto lol.
If his gf can fuck her bestie then it’s kinda unfair to Morimoto, though it seems like he doesn’t care so all good?
glad i finished on a lovey dovey scene because damn it got dark quick.
way to ruin a good series
good ol metamor
chapter 1 was cool til he turned into a girl. then the reverse fuck. then the ntr. then the blatant cheating. now i got a soft dick and im pissed
I could see the plot from a mile away tbh. Kinda mad the teacher didn't get any too.
What the fuck did I read. From the blackmail rapist to the sudden fucking of Nakamura shit just got so weird. And we really letting the rapist off that easily, huh?

What? You showed the rape but not when she did it with Nakamura? Also, this series has surprisingly nice plot. So MC was fated to be with Natsuzuka, huh. MC turned into a female because Natsuzuka relieved that the MC can relieve her dick if he wanted to and, well… he did. MC turned back into a guy because Natsuzuka felt soiled by another guy and wanted the MC’s warmth as a guy once more. While I wanted the MC to beat that rapist asshole to the death (fucker even punched him before), seeing Natsuzuka punched him was quite satisfying as well
I was hoping for a extra ffm moment at the end but they didn't even show the final bit too, it was still good though.

SPOILERS... So, do they both have the same parents, or just different mothers and the same father ? Kind of confusing tbh. The original version shows a picture after the author's final words which isn't in this translation. I translated it roughly, but still not sure what it really meant.
